New Records: Rahmanullah Gurbaz became the quickest Afghanistan batter to reach 1000 ODI runs
Key Match Events: India won by 8 wickets with 90 balls remaining
Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli's performances were highlighted
Pre-Game Insights: Afghanistan faced challenges against India's spin attack
Rohit Sharma discussed adapting to conditions
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma noted the importance of adaptability
Hashmatullah Shahidi focused on improving batting
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pitch conditions in Delhi were favorable for batting
Shardul Thakur might replace R Ashwin due to spin-friendly pitch
Others: The match was part of the World Cup 2023-24
